sentences.en: Anthropological narrative is a research method, which mainly narrate tales.
sentences.cn: 摘要人类学叙事研究即以叙述故事为主要形式的一种人类学研究方法.

sentences.en: But now suppose we approach the question from a -I don't say from an empirical point of view but from a speculative anthropological point of view.
sentences.cn: 现在假设我们从一个特定角度来看这个问题,我不会说从一个经验主义的角度,而是从一个推测的人类学的角度来看。

sentences.en: But she adds there's probably a more anthropological reason at work.
sentences.cn: 但她补充说,可能有更多的人类学因素在起作用.

sentences.en: Discourse analysis and ethnography of communication are two important angles of anthropological linguistics.
sentences.cn: 话语分析和交际民族志是语言人类学研究的两个重要视角.

sentences.en: It is the most difficult of all anthropological data on which to " draw " the old Negro.
sentences.cn: 在所有的人类学资料中,最困难的事莫过于 “ 刻划 ” 古代的黑人.

sentences.en: It seems to me that the idea of a personal God is an anthropological concept which I cannot take seriously.
sentences.cn: 对于我来说，每人心中有一个自己的上帝这一人类学观点，我并没有严肃认真地看待。

sentences.en: It's also a centralized reflection of the anthropological stand of apriorism.
sentences.cn: 这也是康德美学先验人类学立场的集中体现.

sentences.en: These facts of responsibility are an anthropological datums - varied and multiform.
sentences.cn: 这些道德事实是一种人类学资料 —— 性质不同,形式各异.

sentences.en: This work also showed the unique educational anthropological perspectives of how to examine the world.
sentences.cn: 这一作品展示了教育人类学观察世界的独特视角、独特维度.

words.tran_cn: 以人类为中心的；以人类观点解释宇宙万物的
人类起源学的；人类起源的
人为的；[人类] 人类起源的
类人猿的；类人的；（猿等）似人类的
人类本位说；人类中心说
